name: The Outbreak SARS CoV-19
description:
In this game you must save the Solar System from Corona viruses.

Lore

The Coronaviruses are  alien viruses  that,  commanded by their King,  are planning  to  conquer all planets in the Milky Way,  but they don't know that someone is waiting for them...

Commmand

LMouseButton = Shoot

RMouseButton = Active freezing spray

MouseWheel = Change Weapon

WASD = Movement

Spacebar = Jump

E = Buy

Music/Programmed/Art By Alberto Infantino
